plot: Bat went to Paris and came back with loads of pictures to show Fox. Fox has all sorts of ideas of what goes on in Paris, and then there was a surprise.
title: A Bat in Paris
plot_es: Bat went to Paris and came back with loads of pictures to show Fox. Fox has all sorts of ideas of what goes on in Paris, and then there was a surprise.
plot_en: Bat went to Paris and came back with loads of pictures to show Fox. Fox has all sorts of ideas of what goes on in Paris, and then there was a surprise.
